thread.title: Readers' travel photos of the week
thread.title_full: Readers' travel photos of the week

title: Readers' travel photos of the week
text:
Readers' travel photos of the week 
Postmedia Network Thursday, July 09, 2015 06:00 AM MDT Wasaga Beach, Ontario. (Ernest Doroszuk/Postmedia Network) Readers' Travel Photos of the Week 
If you love to travel -- near home or abroad -- and love sharing your vacation photos, we want to hear from you! Each week, we'll ask our readers to submit their travel photos on a specific travel theme. Love to hit the slopes? You'll want to watch out for our skiing theme week. Can't get enough of the high seas? Make sure to send in your cruise photos when we ask! 
Just e mail your original vacation photos to SUNtravelpics@scribblelive.com , follow us on Twitter and tweet your photos to @canoetravel using hashtag #SUNtravelpics or click the upload button below to submit your pics directly! 
Some photos may even be chosen to appear in our newspapers' print editions!
